info.title: Spotify API
info.description: A simple API to get information about a Spotify user

get.summary: Get audio features for several tracks

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of track IDs (Maximum 100 IDs)

get.summary: Get audio features for a track
Get a list of the authenticated user's playlists

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of playlists to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first playlist to return

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields to return

get.summary: Get the cover image for a playlist
Get full details of the items of a playlist owned by a Spotify user.

parameters.name: playlist_id
parameters.description: The Spotify ID of the playlist.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first item to return.

parameters.name: additional_types
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of item types besides 'track'.

get.summary: Get a list of recommended tracks for one to five seeds

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of tracks to return

parameters.name: seed_artists
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of artist IDs

parameters.name: seed_genres
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of genre names

parameters.name: seed_tracks
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of track IDs

parameters.name: min_time_signature
parameters.description: The minimum value of time signature

parameters.name: max_time_signature
parameters.description: The maximum value of time signature

parameters.name: target_time_signature
parameters.description: The target value of time signature

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The type of item to search for

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first item to return

get.summary: Get a list of a user's playlists

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of playlists to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The index of the first playlist to return
